content:
Anyone else with "app prescription" in their scope?
(if this is duplicate, sorry - please redirect)
Yes, we've been doing this in a production system for clinicians for the last couple of years... Happy to discuss
PrescribeIT is an e-prescribing system in Canada
You mean Apps for Presciptions or prescribable Apps? (@dr Kai U. Heitmann , maybe...?)

Prescribable apps. We want to have endorsed apps that can be prescribed by a physician.
#AppsAreMeds
The CARIN Alliance has been discussing a common labeling format, similar to nutrition labelling, with the intent that patients can both comparison shop, but presumably also so they can be prescribed.
that is interesting. Do you consider reimbursements?
